game.name: PAYDAY 2: The Big Bank Heist
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: If money is the lifeblood of this city, then the Benevolent bank is its beating heart.The Big Bank DLC is the eighth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds the new contact the Dentist, the biggest heist yet called the Big Bank as well as the new Preplanning feature.
game.shortDescriptionEn: If money is the lifeblood of this city, then the Benevolent bank is its beating heart.The Big Bank DLC is the eighth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds the new contact the Dentist, the biggest heist yet called the Big Bank as well as the new Preplanning feature.
